definition: the property possessed by a line or surface that departs from the vertical, give or make a list of
details:
noun
- the property possessed by a line or surface that departs from the vertical
= synonyms: inclination
- a database containing an ordered array of items (names or topics)
= synonyms: listing
verb
- give or make a list of
= synonyms: name
- enumerate
= synonyms: number
- tilt to one side
= synonyms: heel
- cause to lean to the side
= example: cause to lean to the side
= synonyms: lean
- include in a list
= example: include in a list
